"Koffie": "In consideration of your activity record, authorization to change to a new class has been granted."
"The class is called \"Hero.\" It's an Advanced Class. It assumes you are a combat veteran."
"Its physical strain is immense. It's only granted to ARKS who have reached a certain level."
"Because it's you we're talking about, I think this is better suited to you. I wish you good luck."
